'use client'; import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import AdminLayout from '@/components/AdminLayout'; import AdminRoute from '@/components/AdminRoute'; import { adminAPI } from '@/lib/api'; import { useLanguage } from '@/contexts/LanguageContext'; import { ShoppingBag, Users, DollarSign, ClipboardList, TrendingUp, ArrowUpRight, ArrowDownRight, MoreHorizontal, Filter } from 'lucide-react'; import Image from 'next/image'; export default function AdminDashboard() { const [stats, setStats] = useState(null); const [recentOrders, setRecentOrders] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const { t } = useLanguage(); useEffect(() => { const fetchStats = async () => { try { const response = await adminAPI.getDashboardStats(); setStats(response.data.stats); setRecentOrders(response.data.recentOrders); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching dashboard stats:', error); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; fetchStats(); }, []); const statCards = [ { title: t('total_revenue'), value: `${(stats?.totalRevenue || 0).toLocaleString()} DA`, trend: '+12.5%', trendUp: true, icon: DollarSign, color: 'bg-purple-500' }, { title: t('total_orders'), value: stats?.totalOrders || 0, trend: '+5.2%', trendUp: true, icon: ClipboardList, color: 'bg-orange-500' }, { title: t('total_users'), value: stats?.totalUsers || 0, trend: '-2.4%', trendUp: false, icon: Users, color: 'bg-blue-500' }, { title: t('total_products'), value: stats?.totalProducts || 0, trend: '+8.1%', trendUp: true, icon: ShoppingBag, color: 'bg-green-500' }, ]; return (
{/* Welcome Section */}

{t('welcome')}, Admin! ğŸ‘‹

{t('welcome_subtitle')}

{/* Stats Grid */}
{statCards.map((stat, index) => { const Icon = stat.icon; return (

{stat.title}

{loading ? '...' : stat.value}

{stat.trendUp ? : } {stat.trend} {t('since_last_month')}
); })}
{/* Charts Section (Mockup) */}
{/* Revenue Chart */}

{t('revenue_analytics')}

{/* Fake Bars */} {[40, 65, 45, 80, 55, 70, 40, 60, 75, 50, 65, 85].map((h, i) => (
))}
JanFÃ©vMarAvrMaiJuin JuilAoÃ»tSepOctNovDÃ©c
{/* Sales by Category (Donut Mockup) */}

{t('sales_by_category')}

85%

{t('growth')}

{t('main_dishes')}
65%
{t('desserts')}
35%
{/* Recent Orders */}

{t('recent_orders')}

{recentOrders.map((order, i) => ( ))} {!loading && recentOrders.length === 0 && ( )}
{t('column_id')} {t('column_customer')} {t('column_status')} {t('column_amount')} {t('column_date')} {t('column_action')}
#{order._id?.slice(-6).toUpperCase() || 'ID'}
{order.customer?.name?.charAt(0) || 'U'}

{order.customer?.name || t('unknown')}

{order.customer?.email}

 {t(order.status) || order.status} {order.totalAmount} DA {new Date(order.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()}
{t('no_orders')}
); }
